s: The rocks from Capcouriers are smooth, making drawing and painting on them much easier. Many of them are perfect for sets of paintings, (such as tic tac toe), as they have very similar sizes and shapes in the mix. I never thought I'd be paying for rocks but these are well worth it in my opinion. They make my fairly talented paintings look like I'm much more gifted. ... This company is a tad pricey but they are by far the best brand ...
